definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: mountain-goat (NH id.; Targum [[יְעֵיעָא]], Syr. yal9o0; Ar. wa9lun, wa9lun; As ia’ilu Dl:S 53 (but Hpt:BAS i. 170, Jäger:ib. 465); Eth. wu9l4: v. Hom:NS 280)—Pl. [[יְעֵלִים]] Ps 104:18 (‖[[שְׁפַנִּים]]); [[חוּרֵי]] ´[[הַיּ]] 1Sa 24:3; [[יַעֲלֵי־סָָלַע]] Job 39:1 (‖[[אַיׇּלוֹת]]; cf. I. [[יַעֲלָה]]).
